senses.sense_definition: Having a shape similar to a small torus or exhibiting small, rounded swellings.

examples.text: The microscopic structure appeared <w>toruloid</w>, with distinct rounded swellings along its length.
Scientists identified the <w>toruloid</w> shape of the spores under high magnification.

senses.sense_definition: Resembling the yeast genus Torula, typically characterized by chain-like or beaded structures.

examples.text: The fungal culture exhibited <w>toruloid</w> growth patterns typical of this specific genus.
Under the microscope, the organism showed <w>toruloid</w> filaments that looked like strings of beads.
